title: Dutch Queen Joins the Military
summary_full: Queen Máxima of the Netherlands enlisted as a reservist, the Royal House said, because the country’s security “can no longer be taken for granted.”
summary_public: Queen Máxima of the Netherlands enlisted as a reservist, the Royal House said, because the country’s security “can no longer be taken for granted.”

NL.label: positive
NL.evidence: country’s security “can no longer be taken for granted.”
